Citation

Source: inst/CITATION

Cecile Proust-Lima, Viviane Philipps, Benoit Liquet (2017). Estimation of Extended Mixed Models Using Latent Classes and Latent Processes: The R Package lcmm. Journal of Statistical Software, 78(2), 1-56. doi:10.18637/jss.v078.i02
